Text: Great upload but Celebrity in Death isn't there.  Do you have it?  It's the one I'm looking for.  Thanks!!!   CP
Celebrity in Death isn't out till next year
ty :) do you by any chance have .lit or just plain .doc or .pdf versions of the books? just wondering since i dunno what program to use to read these file with. btw keep up the good work.

hey remcodevries, you can use adobe digital editions to read epub formatted books. find it at:
http://www.adobe.com/products/digitaleditions/

also you can use calibre http://calibre-ebook.com/ to convert books to other formats.

cheers
